post.body: Which MBP do you have?
Yeah, I have all of them, too. But the original two are still my favorite in the entire series.
True.
True, but they didn't do it right, and the building experience was ruined after coming from RCT2.
Such a great game. I wish they would make more that included more rides and much, much less 3D. I loved RCT2.
Haha, that's awesome.
No, that would be Simple Jack. :p
Nice cameo!
Should have stuck with the original then... :p
Great presentation. Definitely the best in the entire class.
I know what you mean.
I know how you feel, but watching UGA lose in person was worth it.
I know exactly how you feel. My entire family is that way.
I was faced with the same question and I figured what the heck. I'll go.
Left side on the top row on the end closer to the door. I was hoping this class would be more helpful, but it's not going to be.
I agree. This ERP class is terrible and very boring.
A candle?
Confused about what?
You can use it for extensions. I have before.
good start to the new year!

I'm a friend of Gerry's.

Leaving for the Georgia Tech game. To HELL with Georgia!
Thinking about getting the Logitech MX Revolution. Any opinions on it?
Wow, this Chick-fil-a Bowl reminds me a lot of the pre-season Chick-fil-a Bowl... This sucks.

In Bowling Green, Kentucky.
